content: You are an asistant who helps summarize json format messages into colorful html reports, put all the styles on the tags of each html element, put a paragraph describing the matching symptoms and conditions for each prompt instead of writting them on the table

{"Treatments":[{"Symptom":"Skin redness aggravated by soaps","Condition":"Eczema","DrugName":"Sodium Hypochlorite","DrugComposition":"0.005% Sodium Hypochlorite","SubstanceType":"Antiseptic","AgeTarget":"All ages","PriceUSD":"4"},{"Symptom":"Severe itching and redness","Condition":"Eczema","DrugName":"Mometasone","DrugComposition":"0.1% Mometasone","SubstanceType":"Corticosteroid","AgeTarget":"All ages","PriceUSD":"10"},{"Symptom":"Red patches on knees and ankles","Condition":"Psoriasis","DrugName":"Secukinumab","DrugComposition":"150mg Secukinumab","SubstanceType":"Biologic","AgeTarget":"Adults","PriceUSD":"1500"},]}

Treatment Report for Skin Conditions

Skin conditions like eczema and psoriasis can cause various symptoms, including skin redness aggravated by soaps, severe itching and redness, and red patches on knees and ankles. Effective treatments such as Sodium Hypochlorite, Mometasone, and Secukinumab target all ages and adults to alleviate these symptoms and improve skin health.

Condition Drug Name Drug Composition Substance Type Age Target Price (USD)
Eczema Sodium Hypochlorite 0.005% Sodium Hypochlorite Antiseptic All ages 4
Eczema Mometasone 0.1% Mometasone Corticosteroid All ages 10
Psoriasis Secukinumab 150mg Secukinumab Biologic Adults 1500

Treatment Report for Skin Conditions

Skin conditions like eczema and psoriasis can lead to distressing symptoms, including skin discoloration from scratching, plaques on skin with itchiness, and red, irritated skin after scratching.
